description: Polygon's Quality Control is a short podcast hosted by Justin McElroy in which critics talk about a new video game and offer insight and context on their review of that game.
title: Polygon's Quality Control

episodes.subtitle: In each episode of Quality Control, Polygon edito…
episodes.description: In each episode of Quality Control, Polygon editor-at-large Justin McElroy talks to a critic after they review a new game and allows them to add a little bit of extra context and insight. Why did they feel the way they did? What do they wish they had been able to discuss in more depth in their review? Also: Did they play it wrong? As part of their 2015 game of the year series, Justin McElroy discusses Polygon's #6 GOTY: Destiny: The Taken King.
episodes.title: Polygon's #6 2015 GOTY: Destiny: The Taken King

episodes.subtitle: In each episode of Quality Control, Polygon edito…

As part of their 2015 game of the year series, Allegra Frank discusses Polygon's #7 GOTY: Life Is Strange.
episodes.title: 2015 GOTY #7: Life Is Strange

episodes.subtitle: In each episode of Quality Control, Polygon edito…

As part of their 2015 game of the year series, they're discussing their #8 GOTY: Soma.
episodes.title: Polygon 2015 GOTY #8 (tie): Soma

episodes.subtitle: We've got a special series of Quality Control epi…
episodes.description: We've got a special series of Quality Control episodes for you featuring Polygon's Games of the Year. We begin today with #10: Rocket League, featuring Charlie Hall.
episodes.title: Polygon's #10 GOTY: Rocket League

episodes.description: In each episode of Quality Control, Polygon managing editor Justin McElroy talks to a critic after they review a new game and allows them to add a little bit of extra context and insight. Why did they feel the way they did? What do they wish they had been able to discuss in more depth in their review? Also: Did they play it wrong? In this episode, we talk with Britton Peele about hist review of Styx: Master of Shadows.
episodes.title: Styx: Master of Shadows

episodes.subtitle: Our podcast, Quality Control, is a pretty simple …
episodes.description: Our podcast, Quality Control, is a pretty simple idea. In each episode, Polygon managing editor Justin McElroy talks to a critic after they review a new game and allows them to add a little bit of extra context and insight. Why did they feel the way they did? What do they wish they had been able to discuss in more depth in their review? Also: Did they play it wrong? In this episode, we talk with Ben Kuchera about his review of Skylanders: Trap Team. http://www.polygon.com/2014/10/8/6939701/skylanders-trap-team-review-ps4
episodes.title: Skylanders: Trap Team
